subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams, playing what she called one of the best matches of her career, steamrollered Samantha Stosur, 6-1, 6-1, to reach the final at the Family Circle Cup in Charleston, S.C.
snippet: Serena Williams, playing what she called one of the best matches of her career, steamrollered Samantha Stosur, 6-1, 6-1, to reach the final at the Family Circle Cup in Charleston, S.C.
